product_description: Skechers is an award-winning global leader in the lifestyle footwear industry that designs, develops, and markets lifestyle footwear that appeals to trend-savvy men, women and children. name: Ryka Women's, Jumpstart Sneaker
product_description: Get moving and take on the day in these sleek womens slip-on sneakers with a sporty zipper. BEST FOR: Casual walking + everyday wear. PERFORMANCE TECH: Exceptional cushioning throughout for standout comfort. MADE FOR WOMEN FIT: Women’s sneakers designed for a woman’s unique foot shape with a narrower heel, roomier toe + softer cushioning. MATERIALS: Stretch engineered knit upper with stretch gore + Padded heel. CLOSURE: Slip-on fit with front zipper + Heel pull tab. INSOLE: Anatomical insole for arch support + heel support. MIDSOLE: ACTIVfoam™ EVA for soft cushioning + built-up cushion in the midfoot for stability. OUTSOLE: Durable compression-molded rubber outsole. WEIGHT: 232 g/8.3 oz per shoe. HEEL-TO-TOE DROP: 10 mm.
